**Include some background info on these samples, treatments, experimental design**

```{r setup}
library(haemdata)
library(magrittr)
library(SummarizedExperiment)

use_pinboard("onedrive")

se1 <- get_pin("mmu_mrna_2016_2022_GENCODEm28_HLT_qc.rds") %>%
    subset(select = grepl("CML", SummarizedExperiment::colData(.)$project))

se2 <- get_pin("mmu_mrna_cml3_qc_GENCODEm28_HLT_qc.rds")

se <- merge_mrna_se(se1, se2)

pca <- pca_se(se)
```

```{r pca_plots}
pca$biplot
pca$pairs_plot
```
```{r pca_corr, fig.height=9, fig.width=8}
pca$correlation_plot
```

```{r transgenes}
plot_transgenes_se(se)
```
